snippet.title: Stay on board  - Walkthrough of the games I made
snippet.description:
"This game features motion sickness without even using VR"
This game was made in 10 days, by me, Tim Krief, for the dragonjam2017. The theme was space and sea, so here's a boat which goes to space. It's my first game in 3D and I am proud of it... kindof
A game about boat flying to space due to the weather [insert physics proof here] and the player trying to stay on it, with bad control and collision spicing up the challenge!

The games: https://timkrief.itch.io/

I made a playlist of Timelapse videos about how the game was made back then:
https://youtu.be/bobyW8PatKA?list=PLaFbdcIP-CNi2tePU5o9pn5vkFCEPrXdQ

I'm @timkrief on twitter: https://twitter.com/timkrief
